Detailed Description

Encapsulates a bending legacy binding.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzLegacyBendParam::DzLegacyBendParam (  ) 

Default Constructor.

DzLegacyBendParam::DzLegacyBendParam ( DzBone *  driver,
DzLegacyJointParam::ParamAxis  axis 
)

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

Parameters:
driver The bone that drives this joint parameter
axis The axis on which this joint parameter is applied
DzLegacyBendParam::~DzLegacyBendParam (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

DzLegacyBendParam::DzLegacyBendParam ( const DzInFile *  file  ) 

For internal use only.

This constructor is called by the Framework when loading from a file so that certain initializations can be skipped that will happen later in the file load process.

Parameters:
file The file from which this object was loaded.

Member Function Documentation

void DzLegacyBendParam::beginEdit (  )  [virtual]

Begins an editing operation. All changes made to the joint parameter will be added to a single undo item when finishEdit() is called, or will be rolled back if cancelEdit() is called.

See also:
finishEdit(), cancelEdit()

Reimplemented from DzLegacyJointParam.

void DzLegacyBendParam::cancelEdit (  )  [virtual]

Cancels an editing operation and rolls back any changes.

See also:
beginEdit(), finishEdit()

Reimplemented from DzLegacyJointParam.

void DzLegacyBendParam::finishEdit (  )  [virtual]

Ends an editing operation and adds an undo item to the undo stack.

See also:
beginEdit(), cancelEdit()

Reimplemented from DzLegacyJointParam.

void DzLegacyBendParam::getAngles ( float &  a1,
float &  a2,
float &  a3,
float &  a4 
) const

Sets the given variables to the values of the joint blending angles.

Parameters:
a1 The value of a1 will be set to the value of the StaticA angle
a2 The value of a2 will be set to the value of the DynamicB angle
a3 The value of a3 will be set to the value of the DynamicC angle
a4 The value of a4 will be set to the value of the StaticD angle
See also:
getStaticA(), getDynamicB(), getDynamicC(), getStaticD(), setAngles()

float &  posRight,
float &  negLeft,
float &  negRight 
) const

Sets the given variables to the values of the joint bulges.

Parameters:
posLeft The value of this variable will be set to the value of the Positive Left bulge
posRight The value of this variable will be set to the value of the Positive Right bulge
negLeft The value of this variable will be set to the value of the Negative Left bulge
negRight The value of this variable will be set to the value of the Negative Right bulge
See also:

void DzLegacyBendParam::setAngles ( float  a1,
float  a2,
float  a3,
float  a4,
bool  makeDefault = false 
) [slot]

Sets the values of the blending angles

Parameters:
a1 The new value for the StaticA angle
a2 The new value for the DynamicB angle
a3 The new value for the DynamicC angle
a4 The new value for the StaticD angle
See also:
setStaticA(), setDynamicB(), setDynamicC(), setStaticD(), getAngles()
void DzLegacyBendParam::setApplyAngles ( bool  onOff  ) 

Turns the application of the blending angles on/off

Parameters:
onOff If true, the angle values will be used to calculate weights for the joint, otherwise the angle values will be ignored.
See also:
applyAngles()
void DzLegacyBendParam::setApplyBulges ( bool  onOff  ) 

Sets the application of bulges on/off.

Parameters:
onOff If true, the bulge parameters will be used to calculate a bulge for the joint parameter. If false, the bulge parameters will be ignored, and no bulge will be applied.
See also:
applyBulges()
void DzLegacyBendParam::setBulges ( float  posLeft,
float  posRight,
float  negLeft,
float  negRight,
bool  makeDefault = false 
) [slot]

Sets the values of the joint bulge paramters.

Parameters:
posLeft The left bulge parameter for positive rotation.
posRight The right bulge parameter for positive rotation.
negLeft The left bulge parameter for negative rotation.
negRight The right bulge parameter for negative rotation.
See also:
setPosLeftBulge(), setPosRightBulge(), setNegLeftBulge(), setNegRightBulge(), getBulges()
void DzLegacyBendParam::setDynamicB ( float  angle,
bool  makeDefault = false 
)

Sets the DynamicB angle parameter.

Parameters:
angle The new value for the DynamicB angle. This marks the beginning of vertices that will be fully bound to the bone (i.e. have weights of 1.0).
See also:
setAngles(), getDynamicB()

const DzLegacyBoneVertex *  vertMask,
int  maskCount 
) [protected, virtual]
Returns:
A pointer to an array of vertex weights for bulges on positive rotations

float *DzLegacyBendParamgetPosBulgeWeights() const { return m_data->m_posBulgeWeights; }

/**

Returns:
A pointer to an array of vertex weights for bulges on negative rotations

float *DzLegacyBendParamgetNegBulgeWeights() const { return m_data->m_negBulgeWeights; }

/** Calculates vertex weights for the joint parameter

Parameters:
map The weight map that the weights will be added to
node The node to calculate weights for
geom The geometry to calculate weights for

Implements DzLegacyJointParam.

Property Documentation

bool DzLegacyBendParam::applyAngles [read, write]
Returns:
true if the joint blending angles are used in the weight calculation, false if the angles are ignored.
See also:
setApplyAngles()
bool DzLegacyBendParam::applyBulges [read, write]
Returns:
Whether or not the joint bulges are being applied.
See also:
setApplyBulges()
